all_citations.claim: Pure Hands has a Charity Navigator score of 89.75/100, a 98.2% program expense ratio, 0.4 months of working capital, and a fundraising efficiency of $0.02 per $1 raised.
The organization reported total revenue of $184,894,296 in its most recent financial filings.
Pure Hands works to deliver quality relief, livelihood, and capacity-building services to vulnerable communities in Yemen and beyond.
The organization is Zakat-eligible and accepts donations for specific programs like the Blessed Bakery and health services.

baseline_narrative.amal_score_rationale: Pure Hands earns a solid overall rating due to its direct provision of life-saving aid and high alignment with humanitarian needs, though its score is tempered by low working capital reserves.
areas_for_improvement: Limited liquidity with only 0.4 months of working capital available to cover expenses [1].
High geographic concentration of programs within Yemen, which carries inherent regional stability risks [3].

dimension_explanations.alignment: Pure Hands shows high alignment for donors interested in urgent humanitarian causes, specifically within the Yemeni crisis [3]. It is verified as Zakat-eligible and offers multiple giving methods for Muslim donors, including support for its Blessed Bakery and health initiatives [4].
dimension_explanations.impact: The organization demonstrates strong financial health with total revenue of $184,894,296 and a direct provision model that keeps costs per beneficiary low [1][2]. While it maintains a high program expense ratio, its financial stability is slightly constrained by having only 0.4 months of working capital [1].

baseline_narrative.headline: Pure Hands Inc. provides critical humanitarian relief and capacity-building services to vulnerable communities in Yemen with exceptional financial efficiency.
strengths: Exceptional program expense ratio of 98.2%, ensuring maximum funding reaches the field [1].
High fundraising efficiency with a cost of only $0.02 per $1 raised [1].
Zakat-eligible status, providing a verified pathway for Islamic charitable giving [4].
baseline_narrative.summary: Pure Hands Inc. is a humanitarian organization dedicated to delivering quality relief, livelihood, and health services to communities in Yemen and beyond [3]. The organization operates with a high level of transparency, maintaining a Charity Navigator score of 89.75/100 and ensuring that 98.2% of its expenses are directed toward its programs [1][2].

alignment.improvement: The charity could <cite id="3">expand services to other underserved regions</cite> beyond Yemen to diversify its humanitarian footprint.

credibility.explanation: Pure Hands is highly credible due to its <cite id="1">Platinum Seal of Transparency</cite> and <cite id="1">100% independent board members</cite> as reported by Charity Navigator.
credibility.improvement: To strengthen credibility, the charity should <cite id="1">improve its board governance documentation</cite> to address current data gaps in external evaluations.

rich_narrative.headline: Pure Hands Inc. provides critical humanitarian relief and capacity-building services to vulnerable communities in Yemen with exceptional financial efficiency.

ideal_donor_profile.best_for_summary: Best for donors who want to provide direct, high-efficiency humanitarian aid to Yemen and require verified zakat-eligible options.
donor_motivations: Want to fulfill zakat with an organization that has 100% program efficiency
Prioritize aid to the ongoing humanitarian crisis in Yemen
Value low-overhead operations where $0.98+ of every dollar reaches the field
Prefer direct provision of food and medical supplies
giving_considerations: The organization has very low cash reserves, meaning it operates on a 'just-in-time' basis
Focus is almost exclusively on Yemen, which may not suit those seeking global diversification
Evidence of impact is based on internal tracking rather than third-party RCTs
ideal_donor_profile.not_ideal_for: Donors seeking an organization with a large global footprint or those who prefer charities with multi-year financial safety nets.

impact_evidence.evidence_grade_explanation: The organization tracks <cite id="1">two specific outcome metrics</cite> and has a clear theory of change, but lacks independent external evaluations.
impact_evidence.theory_of_change_summary: Pure Hands utilizes a direct provision model to deliver relief and primary medical care, aiming for sustainable development through <cite id="3">capacity-building services</cite>.
impact_evidence.why_evidence_matters: Tracking outcomes ensures that the $10.36 spent per beneficiary actually results in improved health and nutrition status.

long_term_outlook.room_for_funding_explanation: The ongoing crisis in Yemen and the charity's <cite id="2">24.3% revenue growth</cite> indicate a high capacity to absorb and deploy additional funds.
strategic_priorities: Strengthen medical care delivery in Yemen

peer_comparison.differentiator: Pure Hands maintains a <cite id="1">100.0% program ratio</cite>, significantly higher than the <cite id="1">peer median of 89.7%</cite>.

strengths.detail: The organization maintains a <cite id="1">98.2% program expense ratio</cite> and spends only <cite id="1">$0.02 to raise every dollar</cite>, far exceeding industry standards.
Pure Hands achieves a <cite id="1">cost per beneficiary of $10.36</cite>, which is considered exceptional for humanitarian relief in conflict zones.
The charity holds a <cite id="1">Platinum Seal of Transparency from Candid</cite> and a <cite id="1">perfect 100/100 score for Culture & Community</cite> from Charity Navigator.

strengths_deep_dive: Pure Hands demonstrates a high level of operational discipline, managing <cite id="2">$184.3 million in contributions</cite> with minimal overhead. Their <cite id="1">overall score of 89.75/100</cite> from Charity Navigator is bolstered by a <cite id="1">95/100 Impact & Measurement score</cite>, indicating that their programs are not only well-funded but also effectively tracked. The organization's focus on <cite id="3">direct provision of services</cite> in Yemen allows for a streamlined supply chain that maximizes the reach of donor funds.
rich_narrative.summary: Pure Hands Inc. is a specialized humanitarian organization that has become a critical lifeline for vulnerable communities in Yemen since its <cite id="3">founding in 2012</cite>. The organization focuses on delivering essential services including food security, health, and water, sanitation, and hygiene (WASH) to regions devastated by conflict. Pure Hands operates with remarkable financial efficiency, reporting <cite id="2">total revenue of $184,894,296</cite> in 2023, of which a <cite id="1">program expense ratio of 98.2%</cite> was achieved according to recent filings. This lean operational model is further evidenced by a <cite id="1">fundraising efficiency of $0.02 per $1 raised</cite>, ensuring that nearly every dollar donated is converted into direct aid. The organization maintains a <cite id="1">Charity Navigator score of 89.75/100</cite>, reflecting strong performance across accountability and impact metrics. Beyond emergency relief, Pure Hands facilitates <cite id="2">foreign grants totaling $4,448,746</cite> to support local implementation and capacity building, primarily within Yemen. As a <cite id="4">zakat-eligible entity</cite>, it provides a verified channel for Muslim donors to fulfill their religious obligations, specifically serving the <cite id="3">fuqara (poor) and masakin (needy)</cite> through direct provision of medical care and sustainable development programs.
